description: Purchases with GST incurred at 6% and directly attributable to taxable supplies.
Purchase with GST incurred for capital goods acquisition.
Purchase with GST incurred directly attributable to incidental exempt supplies.
Purchase with GST incurred directly attributable to exempt supplies, and only applicable for partially exempt trader/mixed supplier.
Purchase with GST incurred that is not directly attributable to taxable or exempt supplies, and only applicable for partially exempt trader/mixed supplier.
Import of goods with GST incurred. (By referring Customs Form No. 1 (K1),and/or other reference documents)
Imports of goods under Approved Trader Scheme (ATS) whereas the payment of GST chargeable is suspended on the goods imported.
Purchases with GST incurred but not claimable or known as Disallowance of Input Tax.
Purchase from non GST-registered supplier with no GST incurred.
Purchase from GST-registered supplier with zero-rated GST incurred.
Purchase in relation to exempt supply under GST legislations.
Purchase transactions which is out of the scope of GST legislation.
Purchase transactions which disregarded under GST legislation
Any adjustment made to Input Tax (e.g., Bad Debt Relief & other input tax adjustments)
